description:
After a crash landing on earth, the alien friends were taken prisoner in a cruel castle.
But now it's time to break out!!

With your ability to change gravity, you're going on a rotating adventure with over 70 rooms of puzzle fun!
The goal is simple: Collect the key and get back to the door - BUT BE CAREFUL, a lot of traps are blocking your way out.
Take the right steps and be careful when changing your gravity - because, who knows what else might be influenced by gravity...

Save your friends and at the end of everything, defeat the evil wizard!

Features:
- Play the adventure with up to 4 players at the same time
- Extra 2 player Puzzle Mode
- Over 70 levels of puzzle fun
- Unlock new characters during the game
- Special in-game surprises when you reach 100%
- Innovative gameplay and puzzle design
- Fun for all ages
name: Alien Escape
